com.milk.objed
Interface FieldsEditor

All Superinterfaces:
Editor
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseFieldsEditor
public interface FieldsEditor
extends Editor

This interface is for Editors that manage an object with field-like sub-parts. One can expect fieldEvent events to be fired off by objects of this type. All actual editing done by a FieldsEditor in fact must happen by accessing the Editors it hands out in the getField[s]() methods.

Author:
Dan Bornstein, danfuzz@milk.com
, Copyright 1999 Dan Bornstein, all rights reserved.

Method Detail

getFields

public Editor[] getFields()
Return the array of Editors that this object contains. They are returned in the preferred order of presentation to a user.

Returns:
the array of sub-editors

getFieldCount

public int getFieldCount()
Return the count of editors that this object contains.

Returns:
the number of sub-editors

getField

public Editor getField(int idx)
Return the Editor at the given index.

Parameters:
idx - the index
Returns:
the Editor at that index
